column4: Ack, help.  I have just done a reinstall this time to edgy, and now X just displays garbage on the screen.  I have run the dpkg-reconfigure, and edited my xorg.conf down to nill, all to no avail.  The last config attempt locked up my PC (solid red-screen in X untill I could swap tty's and kill it).  Any Advice?
edgy has it on unless you explicitely turn it off
one sec, I'll find the magic incantation for you
right now I am CLI only.  Xorg has no mention of it
that'll turn it off if you put that section in your xorg.conf
do you get any further if you choose vesa as your driver when you dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg?
(not a final solution, but should give a working setup)
yeah, that gave me a desktop.  Thanks
sorry, don't know much about nvidea;  only dealt with intel and ati so far
It's just edgy that is giving me a hard time.  I've been using Nividia fine since "Warty"
